ovdesc.p: AZ. GRACE. LIST ACCNO. DATE A live file relevant to ONLY AZ LOAN accounts for which grace period has been defined. The Field- Acc No and date indicate the loan a/c no and the date on which the loan/installment is due for payment. To illustrate:- For a/c no.40569 if the maturity date is 10.05.2002 and the GRACE days is defined as 5C then ACC NO. DATE will be 40569*10.05.2002 and the key to the file will be 15.05.2002. In case payment is not received even after the GRACE days -the system will calculate penalty from the original due date.
:- Field Apply penalty in AZ. Product. Parameter should be YES The field GRACE. PERIOD should have been input with a numeric(1-99) followed by C (calender) or W( working days)
Key to this file. Refer to helptext of ACCNO.DATE field for further details
